name: Oxyjun速
description: Oxyjun速 increases muscle power one needs to increase blood supply with oxygen and nutrients to the working muscle. Oxyjun速 can be used in a pre-workout formula or protein powder shakes for everyday use. Oxyjun速 can do this for the athlete and also help reduce fatigue. To maximize the pump you need to have a strong and solid workout. To achieve it you need to train properly and increase energy to the working muscle tissue. Power is achieved when muscles receive increased blood flow containing oxygen and nutrients and the removal of waste products.
